## v3.Module interface

Module is basic building block of the App

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Module 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [buildDir?](./teamsfx-api.v3.module.builddir.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> build directory name |
|  [dir?](./teamsfx-api.v3.module.dir.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> root directory name |
|  [hostingPlugin?](./teamsfx-api.v3.module.hostingplugin.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> hostingPlugin is available after add resource, this is an important mapping between module and resource plugin |
